name: nano
description: The official CouchDB client for Node.js

scripts.test: bash scripts/run_couchdb_on_travis.sh; npm run mocha; bash scripts/stop_couchdb_on_travis.sh
scripts.mocha: DEBUG=* NOCK_OFF=true istanbul cover tape tests/*/*/*.js
